column4: anyone know a nice media player with support for shout/ice streams, and global hotkeys?
kk, i'll get the lastest version from their site too
btw audacious is meant to work identically like winamp... that means playing streams and such.
it even is able to use winamp skins :P
buffer underrun... sounds like a bug.
and it works fine if i play a .ogg file
i know, it's with every stream i've tried
i went to the audacious channel and asked them about it, they told me that they didn't care, and that i should use a diffrent media player... -.-
theres already a bug report open on there forum for my bug, i don't think they are going to bother to fix it
also baring in mind i had a developer tell me that "I don't care" and "Go and use something else then"
its the best you can do then unfortunately.
yea, i applied a theme and it broke, :(
